note:
Born Lancashire, raised on a Farm. educated Grammar School, then University (London).
A Countryman at Heart, educated as a Scientist, spent 42 years as an Electronics & Systems Engineer, travelled much of the world.
Father was an Accountant (had also been a Professional Boxer & Trainer), Mother had been a Professional Opera Singer

Hobbies included Long Distance Backpacking, Caving, Rugby (Union), Amateur Operatics, Fly Fishing, Shooting, Reading, now Writing & Caring for others.
